body_html:
Sounds good.

I left a comment about the 3 channels issue.

If you would remove the restriction to 3D from other ops, that would be amazing.

As for unit tests: Please add tests that make sure that these ops actually work as expected when applied to batches. You can probably simply extend the existing tests to add cases for higher input rank. The key is to use predictable input data with known outputs, and keep the tests fast.

body:
Sounds good. 

I left a comment about the 3 channels issue.

If you would remove the restriction to 3D from other ops, that would be amazing.

As for unit tests: Please add tests that make sure that these ops actually work as expected when applied to batches. You can probably simply extend the existing tests to add cases for higher input rank. The key is to use predictable input data with known outputs, and keep the tests fast.
